badges.tooltip: Roblguards Builder Of the Year 2025 award
Roblguards Builder Of the Year 2024 award

reviews.text: He is AMAZING! Bro building next level! W guy.
reviews.author: roblguard

reviews.text: Hamster is a very good builder. He built for me "Europe tower" he is a very fair person, stays in touch with you from the start to the end until the request is fullfiled. Urgent situations he is all in. I highly recommend him.
reviews.author: Altara Project

reviews.text: I asked for a stud-style map and the result went beyond my expectations! The builder nailed the classic Roblox look while keeping everything clean, optimized, and fun to explore. Communication was clear, friendly, and professional troughout the process. Highly recommend for anyone looking top-quality stud builds!
reviews.author: Go Studios
